meanings.definition: Resembling ivory in color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The smooth, ivorylike surface of the statue gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had an ivorylike hue that complemented her skin tone perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The chef's attempt to create an ivorylike cake ended up looking more like a snowman.
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky had an ivorylike glow as the sun began to set.
meanings.sent5: The old piano had keys that were ivorylike, adding to its elegant appearance.
